E-Mail Messages
Date: Tuesday, 4/1/1999
Subject: Retirement
Hi Chief,
I think my time is running out. This will be
my last season as a professional ballplayer.

Sincerely,
Randy O'Neal



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1999
Subject: Progress of Tony Saunders
Dear Sir,
Tony Saunders is doing pretty good at AA Shreveport Captains!
He has an ERA of 2.01, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1999
Subject: Playing time
I'd like to complain about my playing time, I think
I am a pretty good player, so why am I no
regular in your lineups?

Regards,
Damian Miller

a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director
